sourceDesc.p: TEI-page files converted by Python to TEI-entry file

div.p: SERPENTARIUS, in Astronomy, a constellation of the northern hemisphere, called also Ophiuchus, and anciently Æsculapius. The stars in the constellation Serpentarius are, in Ptolemy’s catalogue twenty-nine, in Tycho’s fifteen, in Hevelius's forty, and in the British catalogue seventy- four.
